clanValuesList.title: Respect is foremost.
clanValuesList.description: No one has any moral right to insult anyone.

clanValuesList.title: The game is outside politics.
clanValuesList.description:
In the chat, we do not discuss politics or war. Not even in the slightest way.

If you need to talk about it, take it to private messages.

clanValuesList.title: Clan rules are clan rules!
clanValuesList.description: We adopt them democratically together. Some participate actively, some do not, but we vote and make decisions together.

clanValuesList.title: Exceptions to the rules.
clanValuesList.description:
Everyone's situation is unique, and we respect our members. Therefore, we say first and foremost, if you have issues with free time, let us know.

And in general, anyone who feels they might not have time to play, write to us. We have never ignored anyone.

description.rule: If you realize that you won't be able to play in the near future, you must notify the clan leader or their deputies via Telegram/game chat.
If a player disappears for more than 7 days without notice, they will be expelled from the clan.
If a player misses the "Clan Tournament" without notice, they will be expelled from the clan.
All players, except those absent according to point 1.1, must meet a minimum point requirement. The minimum points for the tournament are always specified in the clan description within the game.
If a player fails to meet the point requirement, they will be punished.
A shortfall from the minimum within 50k points results in a 'warning'.
A shortfall from the minimum exceeding 50k points is considered tournament neglect and results in expulsion from the clan.
If a player earns twice the minimum points in the next clan tournament, the warning is lifted; otherwise, they will be expelled from the clan.
